channel.title: Raphael Grasset - Website
channel.description: Recent content on Raphael Grasset - Website

item.title: Vuforia Engine API
item.description: Company: PTC Duration: 2015-2021 Project Scope: Leading the design and development of the Vuforia Engine (native) API.

item.title: Entreprise AR Framework
item.description: Company: PTC Duration: 2020-present Project Scope: Development of a new high level, modular, scalable industrial AR framework used as the new software stack for all Vuforia Solutions (Instruct, Expert Capture, etc.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Industrial AR Framework (2020-present, Project & Technical Lead) Vuforia Engine API (2015-2020, Technical Lead)

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Or.. Welcome back ! Moved my previous website to a different new host (github pages) and switched from wordpress technology to hugo technology (way simpler to use with benefits of git along the way for versioning).
